more_cobblemon_tweaks.config.option.cust: Allows the player to change PC box names.
Allows the player to change PC box wallpapers.
more_cobblemon_tweaks.config.option.enha: Adds lore describing various information about the pokemon contained in an egg.
more_cobblemon_tweaks.config.option.open: Should the PC remember and open to the last box you had open?
more_cobblemon_tweaks.config.option.pc_c: Colored IVs requires IV Display to be enabled!
If enabled, the IVs in the iv display will be colored matching their respective power items.
more_cobblemon_tweaks.config.option.pc_i: Adds a small widget to the pc menu showing the iv's of the previewed pokemon.
more_cobblemon_tweaks.config.option.pc_s: Adds a button to open/close a search bar.
Hide Unmatched Search requires Box Search to be enabled!
If enabled, pokemon that do not match the search will be hidden instead of greyed out.
more_cobblemon_tweaks.config.option.perf: Perfect IV Egg Indicator requires Enhanced Egg Lore to be enabled!
If Enhanced Egg Lore is enabled, should it display if an egg has perfect IVs with a gold triangle?
more_cobblemon_tweaks.config.option.shin: Shiny Egg Indicator requires Enhanced Egg Lore to be enabled!
If Enhanced Egg Lore is enabled, should it display if an egg is shiny with a gold star?
more_cobblemon_tweaks.config.option.wait: Waiting on cobblemon egg side-mods to update to 1.6!
more_cobblemon_tweaks.pc_enhancements.cu: Click to rename the current box!
Click to change the wallpaper of the current box! (Hold Control to change all boxes)
